title: If Santa existed in real life, would he be arrested or be charged with a crime/felony?
body:
Trespass/Breaking & entering
Slave labor
Theft
Import/export law
Regulations relating to airspace
Blackmail/Protectionism (naughty list)

not to mention the entire thing is just creepy as hell, maybe back in day when you could meet a little boy in the street, and pet him on the head. if you do this today you will be arrested, unless you're a nice looking woman, then no one would care.
